comment: The course includes 4 essays (the 4th is a 5-6 page research paper) and weekly discussions, which can be submitted late. Classes meet once a week, & attendance is taken, but often lasting 20-30 mins or being canceled. Lectures focus on essay requirements & questions, but lectures are generally boring. He provides detailed feedback on Turnitin.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Gives good feedback--Graded by few things

comment: Attendance is taken but only meet once a week. Class was short usually about 30 mins, lectures were a little boring. Only assignments are 4 essays and a discussion post every week. Accepted late work. Gave about 2 weeks for each essay, they weren't hard you should pass as long as you do the essays and discussions. Professor was easy to work with.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Respected--Online Savvy

comment: Only has 4 papers for the semester and a discussion post weekly. Easy grader and gives good feedback. He cares about students and answers questions. He often lets out class very early (or cancels it). His lectures are boring, but quick and can have some good information for your papers.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Caring

comment: Understanding & layback. gives 4 essays and weekly reading with discussion. Sometimes will let class end early. Take him, he gives great feedback on essays.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Respected--Graded by few things

comment: If you need an english professor Mr. Owen is the one. I have nothing but great things to say about him. He's gets right to the point during classes and will let you go early when he's done. The lectures build on each other over time and you will be prepared for each essay. He was extremely helpful when answering questions and provided resources.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Only grades about 4 essays and weekly discussion posts. I barely went to class and got an A. Essays take some work and lectures are very boring. Prof Owen seemed like a genuine person.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria

comment: Mr. Owen devotes most of the time in class explaining the currently assigned essays or discussions. He is very proficient in English reading/writing and is of great assistance for any topic in his class. Additionally, as the semester goes on, attendance seems to become less of a requirement, especially since all the assigned work is online.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Accessible outside class

comment: Not a lot of homework, class doesn't last long either.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--So many papers

comment: Easy A for Composition 2. Barely have to read any of the listed material, so don't bother buying. Class consisted of 2 discussion posts/week and 4 papers, the last being a research paper of your topic. Time it took to complete discussions posts varied, usually very easy though. Sometimes have to read long articles. Very easy grader. Good dude!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria

comment: Took his class online and it's really easy. Answer 2 discussion questions online every week and write 4 essays and you're golden. He also responds quickly to emails whenever I have questions. It's a straightforward online class and something I really appreciate especially being an introvert and hating class participation. Solid choice.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Get ready to read

comment: He's a great teacher that responds quickly, and it's an easy class with light reading. His syllabus shows everything what you have to do on a weekly basis.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria

comment: This was an asynchronous online class. You have to reply to two discussion boards every week based on an article or an assigned topic, and you have 4 essays. First two are relatively easy, and the last two will be based on making your own research paper. He grades really easily! I had no trouble in this class. Seems like a nice man too!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: Easy class. The grade is based on 4 papers and weekly discussion posts. No lectures, light reading.

Take his class! He is easy going, and quickly replies to emails if you need help, even outside of work hours. Although this class is fully online, Prof. Owen seems very caring. I definitely recommend!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Owen is a solid choice for 1101 or 1102. I hate writing but he was always available outside of class and super quick to respond to emails. He made a boring class manageable and his feedback on my essays helped me improve my writing skills.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: Good professor, boring class.
Good prof for 1101. Manages to make a boring class manageable. Hoping he teaches 1102 next semester.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: If you understand common grammar youll be fine. It was an easy A.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things

comment: His lectures are really boring but he seems like a nice guy. He ends class usually in 30 min though instead of the full hour. 4 essays, weekly assignments, and some peer review assignments makes up your grade. If you don't mind sitting through a boring lecture once a week for an easy A, take this class!

He is a decent choice, especially if you don't want to put in a ton of effort. 4 papers, a research paper, proposal, and two kind-of weird summary and analysis ones. He grades weekly discussion posts or peer reviews, takes attendance, and always lets us out of class early. He is an easy grader, but is a decent choice.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things

comment: Very sweet guy. Good professor. Willing to help outside of class. Quick to respond to email.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Good professor overall. Very nice guy, kind of monotone. But he's a good choice for 1101 or 1102.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Caring

comment: Professor Owen is one of the most boring professors I have ever had. All you do in class is have awkward discussions over what you read the night before and no one participates so he awkwardly stares at everyone until someone does. He is a nice person and an easy grader so if you are willing to put in at least a little effort then you will pass.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: First off, if you are just looking for a class to get an A in, this is it. The only major grades are papers, and if you follow the rubric he gives you, you'll get an A. As for the actual class, he is probably the worst teacher I have ever had. He has the most monotone voice ever and he is awful at teaching any concepts he is attempting to teach.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: this was the worst, most boring and pointless class i have ever taken. you don't learn anything and all you do is read a section of the book the night before class and discuss it the next day. the essays he assigns are also ridiculous.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: His class is the most boring & the biggest waste of time. All you do is have class discussion over what you read the night before & it's always so hard for him to effectively describe whatever it is he's trying to say.
rating_tags: Get ready to read

comment: soooo boring. every class is a waste of time.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES
